tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE gmoseeds_usage (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  region_name VARCHAR(50),
  seed_type VARCHAR(50),
  usage_amount INT,
  research_purpose TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE gmo_seed_usage (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    region VARCHAR(50),
    research_purpose VARCHAR(100),
    usage_count INT
)

CREATE TABLE region_details (
    region_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    region_name VARCHAR(50),
    country VARCHAR(50),
    continent VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE research_centers (
    center_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    center_name VARCHAR(100),
    region_id INT,
    research_purpose VARCHAR(100)
)
CREATE TABLE regions ( region_id INT PRIMARY KEY, region_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL )
CREATE TABLE seeds ( seed_id INT PRIMARY KEY, seed_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, genetic_info TEXT )
CREATE TABLE research_centers ( center_id INT PRIMARY KEY, center_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, region_id INT, FOREIGN KEY (region_id) REFERENCES regions(region_id) )

CREATE TABLE seed_usage ( usage_id INT PRIMARY KEY, seed_id INT, center_id INT, usage_date DATE, quantity_used INT, FOREIGN KEY (seed_id) REFERENCES seeds(seed_id), FOREIGN KEY (center_id) REFERENCES research_centers(center_id) )
CREATE TABLE researchers ( researcher_id INT PRIMARY KEY, researcher_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, center_id INT, FOREIGN KEY (center_id) REFERENCES research_centers(center_id) )
